name: Notebook OS
description: Capture and Manage your Notes in NotionA powerful and aesthetic note-taking system that centralizes all your notes into your digital workspace.How does it work?Create quick notes, voice notes or text notes inside your notes systemClassify and organize my notebook, topic, or statusInteract with your archived, on hold, in progress, open, urgent, complete, or favorite notes Review your topics, notebooks, or notesArchive or deleted your irrelevant notesWhat's included?Home page with guideMain dashbo
features: Create quick notes, voice notes or text notes inside your notes system; Classify and organize my notebook, topic, or status; Interact with your archived, on hold, in progress, open, urgent, complete, or favorite notes; Review your topics, notebooks, or notes; Archive or deleted your irrelevant notes; Home page with guide; Main dashboard; All-In-One view of the system; Quick Notes
